paragraph.en: Bacon ipsum dolor amet boudin chislic prosciutto pig strip steak pastrami hamburger landjaeger.  Sirloin meatloaf spare ribs t-bone ham beef ribs.  Kielbasa chuck bacon, shoulder burgdoggen tenderloin tri-tip filet mignon.  Biltong sausage chuck, spare ribs fatback venison hamburger.

title.sm: O le ā o le a tupu?

paragraph.en:
On 6th November 2021 (AEST), there will be a fiafia night for you, our dear brothers and sisters! A night of entertainment and encouragement, provided by our spiritual family from around the world. If you would like to contribute a performance item to this wonderful evening, please explore this site for ideas! 😊


3:00 pm — 6:00 pm (Melbourne, Australia)
5:00 pm — 8:00 pm (NZ)
6:00 pm — 9:00 pm (American Samoa and Samoa)
7:00 pm — 10:00 pm (Hawaii and Rarotonga)
9:00 pm — till late (Las Vegas and Seattle)
paragraph.sm:
I le aso 6 Novema 2021, i le itula e 3pm (taimi ma le aso a Melepone Ausetalia), o le a faia ai se fiafia mo outou uso ma tuafafine peleina! O se afiafi o faafiafiaga ma faalaeiauga ua saunia e lo tatou aiga faaleagaga mai vaipanoa eseese o le lalolagi. Afai e te fia faafiafia i lea po, faamolemole fa’aauau ona faitau i isi itulau o lenei website mo nisi faamatalaga atili! 😊


3:00 pm — 6:00 pm (Melbourne, Australia)
5:00 pm — 8:00 pm (NZ)
6:00 pm — 9:00 pm (American Samoa and Samoa)
7:00 pm — 10:00 pm (Hawaii and Rarotonga)
9:00 pm — 12:00 am (Las Vegas and Seattle)

paragraph.en: "Come, you yourselves, privately into an isolated place and rest up a little." — NWT
paragraph.sm: "Seʻi o tatou ō na o i tatou i se mea tuufua ma fai ai sina mālōlōga." — NWT

paragraph.en: "Therefore, whether you are eating or drinking or doing anything else, do all things for God’s glory." — NWT
paragraph.sm: "O le mea lea, pe tou te aai, pe inu, pe faia se tasi mea, ia faia mea uma lava ina ia faamamaluina ai le Atua." — NWT

paragraph.en: "A time to laugh...and a time to dance." — NWT
paragraph.sm: "Le taimi e ʻataʻata ai...ma le taimi e osooso ai ma le fiafia." — NWT

paragraph.en: Hello! We are your fellow brothers and sisters bringing to you this evening of entertainment. If you would like to contact us or have any questions not answered on this website, please send an email to thenightbeforeproductions@gmail.com.
paragraph.sm: Talofa lava! O i matou o uso ma tuafafine o lo’o saunia lenei faatasiga. Pe a iai sau fesili po o se mea e te fia malamalama iai e faatatau iā i matou faafesootai mai i le tuatusi lenei thenightbeforeproductions@gmail.com
